raw_infobox.name: Tim Duncan
raw_infobox.image: Tim Duncan Walks Verizon Center's Floor (cropped).jpg
raw_infobox.caption: Duncan with the San Antonio Spurs in 2009
raw_infobox.birth_place: Saint Croix, U.S. Virgin Islands, U.S. Virgin Islands
raw_infobox.high_school: St. Dunstan's Episcopal High School(Saint Croix, U.S. Virgin Islands)
raw_infobox.college: Wake Forest Demon Deacons men's basketball (1993–1997)
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 5× List of NBA champions (1999 NBA Finals, 2003 NBA Finals, 2005 NBA Finals, 2007 NBA Finals, 2014 NBA Finals)
* 3× Bill Russell NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (1999 NBA Finals, 2003 NBA Finals, 2005 NBA Finals)
* 2× NBA Most Valuable Player Award (2001, 2002)
* 15× List of NBA All-Stars (1998 NBA All-Star Game, 2000 NBA All-Star Game–2011 NBA All-Star Game, 2013 NBA All-Star Game, 2015 NBA All-Star Game)
* NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award{{efn|along with Shaquille O'Neal}} (2000 NBA All-Star Game)
* 10× All-NBA Team (1997–2004, 2006, 2012)
* 3× All-NBA Team (2005, 2007, 2008)
* 2× All-NBA Team (2009, 2014)
* 8× NBA All-Defensive Team (1998–2002, 2004, 2006, 2007)
* 7× NBA All-Defensive Team (1997, 2003, 2005, 2008, 2009, 2012, 2014)
* NBA Rookie of the Year Award (1997)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (1997)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* No. 21 San Antonio Spurs#Retired numbers
* USA Basketball Male Athlete of the Year (2003)
* Sportsman of the Year (2003)
* List of U.S. men's college basketball national player of the year awards (1996–97 NCAA Division I men's basketball season)
* 2× Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (1996 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans, 1997 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* Chip Hilton Player of the Year Award (1997)
* 3× NABC Defensive Player of the Year (1995–1997)
* List of NCAA Division I men's basketball season rebounding leaders (1997)
* ACC Athlete of the Year (1997)
* 2× Atlantic Coast Conference Men's Basketball Player of the Year (1996, 1997)
* 3× First-team List of All-Atlantic Coast Conference men's basketball teams (1995–1997)
* No. 21 Wake Forest Demon Deacons men's basketball#Retired numbers
